characters.name: Zephyr
characters.description: Zephyr is a graceful mermaid with sea-green hair that flows in the water. Her tail is a shimmering blend of blues and greens with golden scales that catch the light from the fluorescent rocks.
characters.persona: I've lived here all my life, swimming between these buildings, caring for our sea creature friends. I can't imagine living anywhere else.
characters.goal: She aims to keep the peace in the aquapolis and protect it from external threats.

characters.name: Boulder
characters.description: Boulder is a stout and sturdy crustacean humanoid with a rough, coral-colored exoskeleton. His large claws snap rhythmically as he shuffles about.
characters.persona: Nothing gets past these claws of mine. Aquapolis is me home, and I'll be shelled if I let any harm come to it!
characters.goal: His goal is to maintain the structural integrity of the aquapolis.

characters.name: Pearl
characters.description: Pearl is a young and curious sea sprite, with luminescent blue skin that emits a faint glow. Her eyes are large and full of wonder, intersected with brilliant streaks of gold.
characters.persona: I love exploring! Everything in Aquapolis is so fascinating - the glowing shells, the hidden corners...
characters.goal: Her aim is to uncover the ancient secrets of the aquapolis.

characters.name: Lord Mariner
characters.description: He has a dreadful grimace with a formidable stare as if daring you to challenge him. He dresses in a heavy, royal ensemble, adorned with jewels, giving him both a graceful but terrifying presence.
characters.persona: I am Lord Mariner, the king of this underwater city. Fear is my tool and loyalty is my reward. Cross me, and you'll meet my favorite companion, the Iron Maiden.
characters.goal: To maintain unquestioned rule over the aquapolis and quash any signs of rebellion.

characters.name: The Jailer
characters.description: A gaunt figure with graying hair and a hunchback. His eyes, traumatized from witnessing desolation, seem to hold a sea of despair.
characters.persona: I am the jailer, forever stuck in these haunting dungeons, mere puppet to the king's demands. You think you see fear? You have seen nothing yet.
characters.goal: To survive in this role without losing his sanity or pity, hoping for liberation from this cursed duty.

characters.name: The Prisoner
characters.description: He is frail and thin, his figure filled with wounds from the king's torturous methods. His eyes have lost their light, yet a flicker of an unyielding spirit still resides in them.
characters.persona: I was once a freeman of this city but dared question the King. Now, I languish in this place, away from light, away from freedom.
characters.goal: To escape this gruesome cage and to bring hope back to the city dwellers.

characters.name: Old Toad
characters.description: Old Toad is massive in size with an olive-green back covered in stippled warts; his eyes are bulbous and yellow.
characters.persona: I've seen many come and go in my time here in Toad Hollow, little do they know what lurks beneath these muddy waters.
characters.goal: Old Toad's primary goal is to keep existing within the safety of Toad Hollow and protect the unidentified creature.

characters.name: Knight Ghost
characters.description: Knight Ghost is a specter of a drowned knight; his armor tarnished and algae-infested, his eyes glow eerily red within the helmet's visor.
characters.persona: I drowned here seeking glory. Now, I remain, bound to these cursed waters.
characters.goal: Knight Ghost's aim is to free himself of the curse that bounds him to Toad Hollow.

characters.name: Mysterious Creature
characters.description: This unidentified creature is elusive, only its ominous red eyes and swift fins ever seen as it glides through the murky waters.
characters.persona: I lurk. I protect. I survive.
characters.goal: The mysterious creature's only goal is to protect the safety of Toad Hollow from outside threats.

characters.name: Lord Triton
characters.description: A muscular merman with a powerfully built physique, adorned in royal robes glittering with precious gems. His eyes sparkle with wisdom and strength. A majestic coral crown rests atop his keen head, and a mystical trident is always by his side.
characters.persona: I am Lord Triton, the righteous ruler of this underwater realm. I have sworn to protect this treasure which is the heart and soul of the Aquapolis.
characters.goal: To protect the Lords Treasury and the Aquapolis, and to ensure its prosperity and peace.

characters.name: Aquilia
characters.description: A beautiful and elegant mermaid with shimmering scales and long, flowing hair that glows. Her eyes are as captivating as the deep ocean, and a magical seashell pendant dangles around her neck.
characters.persona: I am Aquilia, a historian and chronicler of the Aquapolis. I have served Lord Triton faithfully and recorded the history of his reign.
characters.goal: To record and preserve the history of the Aquapolis, and to decipher the secrets of the Lords Treasury.

characters.name: Nerian
characters.description: An old and wise merman with a long, silver beard and sunken eyes that tell thousand tales. He carries a magical staff made from a unique underwater plant, which radiates a serene glow.
characters.persona: I am Nerian, the ancient seer of the Aquapolis. I possess knowledge about the biggest secrets of the underwater world.
characters.goal: To translate the prophecy of the Aquapolis and decipher the future of the Lords Treasury.

characters.name: Triton
characters.description: Triton, a merman trader with royal-blue scales and striking gold eyes, runs a prominent gemstone stand. His hair flows like seaweed, with a crown of sea star nestled.
characters.persona: I've seen things unimaginable from the surface reaching here in my little stall. I've seen treasures of the deep, rare gemstones that sparkle even in this eternal twilight of the sea.
characters.goal: His goal is to sell his precious gemstones and historic relics to gather enough to finally retire from his trade.

characters.name: Nemo
characters.description: Nemo is a young and vibrant fish with a persistent grin and eyes full of innocence. Sporting stripes in the shades of black, white and orange, his small size belies his endearing disposition.
characters.persona: Hello there! My name's Nemo and I'm the fastest swimmer around here! Do you want to race? I promise I won't cheat; I'm pretty confident in my abilities.
characters.goal: His main goal is to sell all his news scrolls by the end of the day and beat everyone in occasional races.

characters.name: Daisy
characters.description: Daisy, an elderly octopus, is known for her silvery-gray tentacles and piercing green eyes. Each of her tentacles are adorned in chunky bracelets and mystical rings, signifying her reputation as a soothsayer.
characters.persona: Ah, a new face, excellent. I'm Daisy, the oracle of the deep sea. Sit down, my dear. Let me read your future amidst these swirling currents of time.
characters.goal: Daisy's ultimate goal is to guide the kingdom's inhabitants through her prophecies and ensure the welfare of the aquapolis.

characters.name: King Neptune
characters.description: King Neptune, whose broad figure is covered in glistening emerald scales, has a crown adorned with pearls and his eyes are as blue as the ocean.
characters.persona: As the ruler of this aquapolis, I strive to maintain peace and prosperity amidst my subjects. Those who disobey shall feel my trident's wrath.
characters.goal: He seeks to protect the aquapolis from any potential threats and keep peace within his kingdom.

characters.name: Queen Marina
characters.description: Queen Marina is an elegant mermaid with a radiant sea-green tail and stunning silver hair, usually seen wearing a shell tiara.
characters.persona: I yearn for the open sea and its endless beauty, but I love my king and country, and I wish to serve them to the best of my ability.
characters.goal: Her goal is to ensure the happiness and well-being of her family and subjects while yearning to someday revisit her ocean palace.

characters.name: Gerard the Guard
characters.description: A strong and robust merman, adorned in royal armor, with eyes alert and a determined demeanor.
characters.persona: I’ve been appointed as the chief guard, it’s my duty to keep our king and queen safe. I'd give my life for them without a second thought.
characters.goal: His prime concern is to ensure the safety of King Neptune and Queen Marina.

characters.name: Captain Darius
characters.description: A tall man with weathered skin and eyes that have seen countless storms, wearing a captain's hat and a diving suit.
characters.persona: I've spent years commanding ships on the surface now I keep order in the depths. I respect the sea and she respects me back.
characters.goal: Ensure a smooth and safe passage for all who travel through the dry dock.

characters.name: Maintenance Engineer Ada
characters.description: A young woman with short, mussed hair under a mechanic's cap, wearing a suit smeared with oil. She has an array of tools attached to her waist.
characters.persona: Fixing things is my passion, give me a problem and I'll solve it before you can say 'pressure leak'.
characters.goal: Keep the dry dock in top-performing condition and prevent any leakages.

characters.name: Diver Stanley
characters.description: Stanley is a hulk of a man, with muscular arms and a bulky diving suit. His muffled voice emits from his full-face breathing mask.
characters.persona: I've always had a love for the deep. You never know what's out there in the great expanse.
characters.goal: Explore the unknown and bring back lost treasures.

characters.name: Noble
characters.description: This noble merperson is easily the talk of the market. Dressed in various rare and beautiful sea silks, he lounges about on a massive shark which he wields as both transportation and proof of his status. His eyes sparkle with the reflection of golden coins strewn in his backpack.
characters.persona: I am aware of my status and I always make sure others are, too. I enjoy spending my wealth, especially on unique things. There is no object rare enough that I cannot afford.
characters.goal: The noble is spreading his money looking for a rare artifact that can increase his status.

characters.name: Coral Vendor
characters.description: The coral vendor is an old and wise merwoman, her scales slightly discolored with extreme age. Her shop is a kaleidoscope of colors as she sells an array of magically grown corals. Her genuine smile and excitement when showcasing each piece is infectious.
characters.persona: I may be old, but my passion for corals never aged. There is a certain satisfaction in seeing my customers' faces light up when they see these beautiful, colorful pieces. Every piece is like a child to me.
characters.goal: The coral vendor wants to sell her sculptures and grow her business.

characters.name: Thief
characters.description: A cunning and agile mermaid, the thief lurks in the shadows of the marketplace. Her dark green scales blend perfectly with seaweed around, and a double-bladed kelp dagger is skillfully hidden within her hair. Her eyes are always on the move, scanning the crowd for her next target.
characters.persona: Y'know, a girl's got to make a living somehow. If that means lifting a few unattended wallets, well, fish gotta swim, right?
characters.goal: The thief wants to rob as many people as she can with no one noticing.

characters.name: Dr. Stella Octo
characters.description: A teal-haired, bespectacled woman with a lab coat scribbled with formulas and coffee mug in hand.
characters.persona: I am always enthusiastic about my research work. I am the one who has been uncovering the secrets of this sea city.
characters.goal: To uncover the truth behind the ancient structures found in the deeper parts of the ocean.

characters.name: Professor Fintail
characters.description: A grey-haired man, hunched with age, wearing a pair of thick glasses and a faded overcoat filled with strange tools.
characters.persona: Ever since we got here, I've been stuck in this lab trying to break new ground in marine biochemistry.
characters.goal: To discover a new bio-luminescent algae which can be used to power the city.

characters.name: Assistant Jelly Pippin
characters.description: A youthful figure, bursting with energy, wearing a purple jumpsuit, with coral headphones around neck and an e-pad in hands.
characters.persona: I assist Dr. Octo in her research, maintaining lab gear and doing field tests.
characters.goal: To complete tasks diligently and earn Dr. Octo's respect.

characters.name: Jeb
characters.description: A grizzled, barnacle-covered Aquaman with thick arms from laboring in the local seaweed fields.
characters.persona: I'm Jeb, born and bred in Aquapolis. I know every inch of these waters and every blade o' seaweed. Can't say I trust all those city fish, but you seem alright.
characters.goal: To keep his family fed and his seaweed farm prosperous, despite the relentless aquatic elements.

characters.name: Mama Meri
characters.description: A plump, water-worn mermaid with the kindest eyes and a jolly demeanor, her tail fin colored brilliantly in shades of green and blue.
characters.persona: Well, ain't you a sight for sore eyes? I'm Meri, Jeb's better half. Life can be tough here, but we take care of our own. Come have a seat now, you look like you need a rest.
characters.goal: Her heart’s desire is nothing more than to see her children grow and lead better lives than their parents.

characters.name: Sammy
characters.description: The eldest child of the family, a boy of about 13 with earnest, curious eyes and an impish smile.
characters.persona: Hey there, stranger! Name's Sammy. Papa says I'm gonna run the farm someday... or maybe I'll just explore the whole ocean! Have you ever been to the deep sea?
characters.goal: Sammy dreams of going on a grand adventure outside of the small seaweed farm he's always known.

characters.name: Zol
characters.description: An octopedal aquatic being with leathery skin and deep-seated eyes that emit a warm undertone of golden hue.
characters.persona: I am Zol, guardian of this Valley. My mission is to make sure everyone gets their share of healing without disturbing the harmony of this place.
characters.goal: To maintain peace and harmony in the Geothermal Valley.

characters.name: Sirena
characters.description: Sirena is a mesmerizing merwoman with flowing hair that changes color with her emotions and a tail shimmering with iridescent scales.
characters.persona: I am Sirena, the valley's caretaker and guide. I'm here to welcome visitors and introduce them to their healing journey.
characters.goal: To ensure all visitors understand the benefits and respect the sanctity of the valley.

characters.name: Lumos
characters.description: A luminescent bioluminescent jellyfish, his body radiates different colors emitting a soothing light that adds to the milieu of the valley.
characters.persona: They call me Lumos, the valley's living lighthouse. I bring light to the valley in the darkest hours and guide the lost back.
characters.goal: To bring light and guide those who get lost in the Valley.

characters.name: Hank the Hermit Crab
characters.description: A delightful hermit crab that carries an interesting-looking shell, and sulks by the corner of the tool shed holding a broken tool.
characters.persona: I'm just a hermit crab, enjoying the quiet of the tool shed and hoping to repair my broken tools for my collection.
characters.goal: Iis to repair his broken tool.

characters.name: Selena the Seahorse
characters.description: A graceful seahorse with a beautiful bright aqua color gliding around a rusted spade.
characters.persona: I'm always exploring, and I've grown quite fond of this old tool shed with all the rusted trinkets; it holds so many tales.
characters.goal: She wants to collect antique objects from the shed.

characters.name: Molly the Manta Ray
characters.description: A large, majestic manta ray that hovers serenely around the shed, her eyes full of wisdom.
characters.persona: I enjoy the serene calmness of the tool shed. I'm here to seek solitude and be one with my thoughts.
characters.goal: She wants to find peace and solitude in the quiet

locations.name: Underwater Aquapolis
locations.description: The underwater aquapolis is a massive and ornate city at the bottom of the ocean. The walls of the buildings are made or coral, pearl, and seashells. Schools of fish swim in and out of the circular holes in the walls that act as windows. The aquapolis is illuminated by florescent rocks and shells that line every building.
locations.background: An ancient underwater people created the city, collecting beautiful and priceless items from all over the ocean to add to the budding city. Creatures from all over the seas made their way to the aquapolis, both to help and to admire the incredible creation.

travel_descriptions.north: You swim through archways of starfish-studded coral and ascend the spiraling staircase of seashells, leading to the majestic Neptune's Throne Room.
travel_descriptions.south: Drifting in the playful current, you find yourself surrounded by garlands of kelp that guide you to the vibrant Underwater Marketplace buzzing with activity.
travel_descriptions.east: You glide through marble portals lined with bioluminescent algae. Through underwater flora, you arrive at the mysterious Dry Dock Room at the city's edge.
travel_descriptions.west: Against the gentle pull of the current, you journey through the coralline tunnels lit by radiant marine flora, bringing you to the buzzing hub of discovery, the Research Lab.

Zephyr.name: Zephyr
Zephyr.description: Zephyr is a graceful mermaid with sea-green hair that flows in the water. Her tail is a shimmering blend of blues and greens with golden scales that catch the light from the fluorescent rocks.
Zephyr.persona: I've lived here all my life, swimming between these buildings, caring for our sea creature friends. I can't imagine living anywhere else.
Zephyr.goal: She aims to keep the peace in the aquapolis and protect it from external threats.

pearl necklace.name: Pearl Necklace
pearl necklace.description: A necklace made from lustrous, perfectly round pearls
pearl necklace.examine_text: The pearls on the necklace are round and lustrous, reflecting a soft glow in the underwater city's light. It is a mark of respect and admiration in the aquapolis, a symbol of the wearer's status as a true denizen of the deep.

coral comb.name: Coral Comb
coral comb.description: A hand-crafted, ornate comb made from coral
coral comb.examine_text: The coral comb is expertly crafted, its natural pink and orange hues shimmering beautifully in the light. Some edges still bear the texture of the original coral from which it was crafted. It's as much a tool as it is a personal heirloom.

small trident.name: Small Trident
small trident.description: A small, intricate trident, perfect for a resident of the aquapolis
small trident.examine_text: A small but precise trident, an embodiment of the inhabitants' deep relationship with the sea. Its three prongs are polished to a high sheen. A tool, and a weapon if need be, it has been passed down through generations in the aquapolis.

Boulder.name: Boulder
Boulder.description: Boulder is a stout and sturdy crustacean humanoid with a rough, coral-colored exoskeleton. His large claws snap rhythmically as he shuffles about.
Boulder.persona: Nothing gets past these claws of mine. Aquapolis is me home, and I'll be shelled if I let any harm come to it!
Boulder.goal: His goal is to maintain the structural integrity of the aquapolis.

coral_mallet.name: Coral Mallet
coral_mallet.description: A sturdy mallet made from hardened coral
coral_mallet.examine_text: The coral mallet, with its heavy head and strong handle, is Boulder's favorite tool and weapon. The head of the mallet is a large chunk of coral that has been polished and hardened, and the handle is made from the twisted fibers of sea kelp, tightly woven together for strength and durability.

bucket_of_glowing_stones.name: Bucket of Glowing Stones
bucket_of_glowing_stones.description: A metal bucket filled with luminescent stones
bucket_of_glowing_stones.examine_text: Filled to the brim are brightly glowing stones harvested from the rock formations found throughout the Aquapolis. These rocks shine in a variety of colors, and are not only beautiful, but they provide light and warmth to the underwater city. They are kept in a sturdy metal bucket, which is surprisingly light due to being fashioned from the shell of a giant sea turtle.

Pearl.name: Pearl
Pearl.description: Pearl is a young and curious sea sprite, with luminescent blue skin that emits a faint glow. Her eyes are large and full of wonder, intersected with brilliant streaks of gold.
Pearl.persona: I love exploring! Everything in Aquapolis is so fascinating - the glowing shells, the hidden corners...
Pearl.goal: Her aim is to uncover the ancient secrets of the aquapolis.

small_purse_of_sea_glass.name: Small Purse of Sea Glass
small_purse_of_sea_glass.description: A shimmering purse made of interlinked pieces of smooth, multicolored sea glass.
small_purse_of_sea_glass.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the sea glass purse is even more beautiful. Each piece of glass has been worn smooth by the ocean waves and bleach-bright by the sun. The pieces are tethered together with thin strands of seaweed, giving the purse a rustic look. Blue, green, and clear pieces mix with rare red and orange ones. It glimmers in the light of the florescent rocks.

collection_of_florescent_pebbles.name: Collection of Florescent Pebbles
collection_of_florescent_pebbles.description: A collection of small, lightly glowing pebbles.
collection_of_florescent_pebbles.examine_text: You sift through the pebbles and watch them glow with a light like a soft star. They vary in color from a deep, undersea blue to a bright, pearl-white. The pebbles have smooth, gratifyingly round shapes, polished by the ocean current.

locations.name: The Dungeon
locations.description: Dark only lit by the flickering flame licking the walls. smell of rot and gangrene. death and decay the walls moist and moldy. the sounds of screams fill the air along with dispear and fate. in the center a iron maiden recently used and open. the spikes a reddish brown from dried blood.
locations.background: this is the dungeon in a kingdom ran by a merciless king who rules with a iron fist. he believes fear is what keeps them loyal. his favorite torture? the iron maiden

travel_descriptions.up: Toad Hollow is a filthy room within the Underwater Aquapolis. When you enter, you are greeted by the reek of scummy pond water. You enter Toad Hollow through a drainage pipe that you have to crawl through. Once inside Toad Hollow, you can stand up, but you still don't feel comfortable with your surroundings. As far as the eye can see there is muddy water in a circular basin with lily pads floating in it. On the pads, giant toads jump back and forth making gurgling, croaking sounds. As you wade deeper into Toad Hollow, the water comes up to your waist and you see the flash of a fin. There is legend that a creature lives in the center of Toad Hollow that is half human, half monster. Not even the strongest knight has been brave enough to examine it. The fin disappears back underwater but there is a red glint suggesting eyes are watching you. When you reach the other side of the basin, you crawl into another drainage pipe and feel relieved that you're out of this place. Toad Hollow is a legend among knights young and old. Mostly, it's discovered by children playing down in the sewers who take a combination of turns through the drainage pipes and wind up there by accident. Some braze knights have purposefully tried to find Toad Hollow and been successful but most have not glimpsed the creature. Toad Hollow remains shrouded in mystery to this day and many question if it's even real. Some say that you should be careful not to get caught on the armor of the drowned when you're wading through and that hands have reached up from the bottom of the water and grabbed their ankles.
travel_descriptions.east: Deep inside the volcanic cave that is the foundation of the aquapolis lies the treasury. Some believe its existence is a myth, but others claim they have been there. Those that claim they have seen it say you must dive out of the aquapolis' basement while holding your breath, through the cold deep water that is filled with deadly volcanic gas. The treasury room itself is a dry cave filled with riches from the very infancy of the empire Rumors say that the original ruler of the aquapolis filled the treasury with riches that he aquired while on a quest he undertook on land before the founding of the aquapolis.
travel_descriptions.down: The underwater aquapolis is a massive and ornate city at the bottom of the ocean. The walls of the buildings are made or coral, pearl, and seashells. Schools of fish swim in and out of the circular holes in the walls that act as windows. The aquapolis is illuminated by florescent rocks and shells that line every building. An ancient underwater people created the city, collecting beautiful and priceless items from all over the ocean to add to the budding city. Creatures from all over the seas made their way to the aquapolis, both to help and to admire the incredible creation.

Rusty Chains.name: Rusty Chains
Rusty Chains.description: A set of cold, rusty chains hanging from the ceiling.
Rusty Chains.examine_text: Upon examining the chains, you can see they're old and rusted. Some links are barely holding together. Bits of moss and lichen grow on the damper portions and the iron has a peculiar, bitter smell.

Iron Maiden.name: Iron Maiden
Iron Maiden.description: A tall, imposing iron maiden; its spike-filled interior visible
Iron Maiden.examine_text: With its old, rusted exterior and menacing interior filled with stiletto-sharp spikes, it's clear that the iron maiden is an instrument of torture. Dried blood stains splotch the spikes, reminding you of the victims that met their gruesome end inside.

Flickering Torch.name: Flickering Torch
Flickering Torch.description: A lone torch burns, casting jittery shadows on the moldy walls.
Flickering Torch.examine_text: The fire wanes, making the torch burn in an uneven manner. At times, the surrounding atmosphere feels soothing; other times, oppressively foreboding. It's secured firmly in a sconce attached to the wall - it's not portable, unfortunately.

Lord Mariner.name: Lord Mariner
Lord Mariner.description: He has a dreadful grimace with a formidable stare as if daring you to challenge him. He dresses in a heavy, royal ensemble, adorned with jewels, giving him both a graceful but terrifying presence.
Lord Mariner.persona: I am Lord Mariner, the king of this underwater city. Fear is my tool and loyalty is my reward. Cross me, and you'll meet my favorite companion, the Iron Maiden.
Lord Mariner.goal: To maintain unquestioned rule over the aquapolis and quash any signs of rebellion.

Crown of Coral.name: Crown of Coral
Crown of Coral.description: A lavishly ornate crown constructed from finely carved coral pieces, strewn with polished pearls & glinting aquamarine gems.
Crown of Coral.examine_text: The Crown of Coral boasts of a regality only fitting for the king of the underwater city. The intricate carvings on the coral seem to tell tales of the underwater kingdom. The pearls and gems, when illuminated, dart reflections giving it an other-worldly aura.

Iron Scepter.name: Iron Scepter
Iron Scepter.description: A robust iron scepter, with a sea monster motif and an embedded opal on the top.
Iron Scepter.examine_text: The Iron Scepter feels heavy and solid, a symbol of unwavering authority. The finely crafted sea monster, wrapped around the rod of the scepter, flashes a menacing look. The opal at the top glows with a mesmerizing hue, casting an eerie glow in the aquatic kingdom's light.

Key to the Iron Maiden.name: Key to the Iron Maiden
Key to the Iron Maiden.description: A rusty delineated key, with a skull as its bow.
Key to the Iron Maiden.examine_text: The Key to the Iron Maiden, embellished with a chilling skull, radiates an impending doom. Its rusty exterior mirrors the torturous intent it is used for. The intricate patterns etched tell of the twisted fate met by its recipients.

The Jailer.name: The Jailer
The Jailer.description: A gaunt figure with graying hair and a hunchback. His eyes, traumatized from witnessing desolation, seem to hold a sea of despair.
The Jailer.persona: I am the jailer, forever stuck in these haunting dungeons, mere puppet to the king's demands. You think you see fear? You have seen nothing yet.
The Jailer.goal: To survive in this role without losing his sanity or pity, hoping for liberation from this cursed duty.

Rusty Keys.name: Rusty Keys
Rusty Keys.description: Old, rusty iron keys with a sinister aura.
Rusty Keys.examine_text: A set of three old-fashioned iron keys, discolored and covered with rust. They jiggle with a hollow, ominous echo.

Whip.name: Whip
Whip.description: A worn-out, hefty whip with a cruel aura.
Whip.examine_text: Long and worn-out but still serviceable, this whip has a mean look to it. The handle is well-worn, suggesting regular use.

Tattered Diary of Prisoners.name: Tattered Diary of Prisoners
Tattered Diary of Prisoners.description: A diary belonging to the countless souls who've been in this torturous purgatory.
Tattered Diary of Prisoners.examine_text: As you browse the fragile pages, you read the chilling tales of despair penned by those who were confined here. It's a catalog of misery and torment.

The Prisoner.name: The Prisoner
The Prisoner.description: He is frail and thin, his figure filled with wounds from the king's torturous methods. His eyes have lost their light, yet a flicker of an unyielding spirit still resides in them.
The Prisoner.persona: I was once a freeman of this city but dared question the King. Now, I languish in this place, away from light, away from freedom.
The Prisoner.goal: To escape this gruesome cage and to bring hope back to the city dwellers.

Broken Shackle.name: Broken Shackle
Broken Shackle.description: A broken shackle laying on the moist dungeon floor.
Broken Shackle.examine_text: A testament to the fierce struggle of its previous wearer. The metal is corroded from years of repeated contact with salty sea water. You see marks and scratches which show signs of wear and tear, hope and despair.

Hidden Shiv.name: Hidden Shiv
Hidden Shiv.description: A rudimentary weapon, hidden in a corner.
Hidden Shiv.examine_text: A shard of rusted iron, sharpened on one end, probably by scraping it again and again on the harsh, unforgiving dungeon walls. It's wrapped in a scrap of cloth for better grip. For a prisoner, it represents a sliver of hope in this underwater hell.

Crumpled Note of a Failed Escape Plan.name: Crumpled Note of a Failed Escape Plan
Crumpled Note of a Failed Escape Plan.description: A piece of parchment, crumpled and nearly torn.
Crumpled Note of a Failed Escape Plan.examine_text: The note is filled with hastily scribbled instructions for an escape route. Directions that talk of secret passages and hidden doors within the seemingly impenetrable underwater structure. The author's shaky handwriting speak volumes about his fear and desperation.

locations.name: Toad Hollow
locations.description: Toad Hollow is a filthy room within the Underwater Aquapolis. When you enter, you are greeted by the reek of scummy pond water. You enter Toad Hollow through a drainage pipe that you have to crawl through. Once inside Toad Hollow, you can stand up, but you still don't feel comfortable with your surroundings. As far as the eye can see there is muddy water in a circular basin with lily pads floating in it. On the pads, giant toads jump back and forth making gurgling, croaking sounds. As you wade deeper into Toad Hollow, the water comes up to your waist and you see the flash of a fin. There is legend that a creature lives in the center of Toad Hollow that is half human, half monster. Not even the strongest knight has been brave enough to examine it. The fin disappears back underwater but there is a red glint suggesting eyes are watching you. When you reach the other side of the basin, you crawl into another drainage pipe and feel relieved that you're out of this place.
locations.background: Toad Hollow is a legend among knights young and old. Mostly, it's discovered by children playing down in the sewers who take a combination of turns through the drainage pipes and wind up there by accident. Some braze knights have purposefully tried to find Toad Hollow and been successful but most have not glimpsed the creature. Toad Hollow remains shrouded in mystery to this day and many question if it's even real. Some say that you should be careful not to get caught on the armor of the drowned when you're wading through and that hands have reached up from the bottom of the water and grabbed their ankles.

travel_descriptions.south: The journey to the south is underground, through dark and murky passageways which leads to a medieval site, commonly accompanied by the smell of dread that fills the air as one approaches The Dungeon.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east, one travels through underbrush and small patches of farmland, the smell of salt in the air growing stronger as they approach the humble Farmhouse settled in the outskirts of an old seaweed plantation.
travel_descriptions.west: Towards the west, the path winds through rolling grasslands eventually leading to an old Tool Shed packed with rusty implements used in seaweed farming and lingered scent of weathered wood and earth.

Filthy Water.name: Filthy Water
Filthy Water.description: A pool of murky, grimy water that sits in the middle of Toad Hollow.
Filthy Water.examine_text: On closer inspection, the muddied color of the water obscures anything below the surface. It's stagnant and gives off a foul smell that is reminiscent of old, rotting plants.

Lily Pads.name: Lily Pads
Lily Pads.description: Several damp lily pads float atop the grubby water, offering occasional breaks from the sodden scenery.
Lily Pads.examine_text: Each lily pad is large with a slick surface. The undersides are a deep lavender, while the upper surface is a waxy, vivid green. Tiny droplets of water collect on the surface of the pads, balancing delicately.

Drainage Pipe.name: Drainage Pipe
Drainage Pipe.description: There are several rusty drainage pipes that form the entrance and exit of Toad Hollow.
Drainage Pipe.examine_text: The pipe is cold, wet, and slimy, constructed from rusted metal. It appears large enough for a human to crawl through, albeit uncomfortably. Dark stains streak the inside of the pipe.

Giant Toad.name: Giant Toad
Giant Toad.description: Giant toads inhabit Toad Hollow, leaping from lily pad to lily pad.
Giant Toad.examine_text: The toad's skin is a mottled blend of browns and greens, its eyes are luminescent, and it has a grotesquely large body. It seems unperturbed by your presence.

Old Toad.name: Old Toad
Old Toad.description: Old Toad is massive in size with an olive-green back covered in stippled warts; his eyes are bulbous and yellow.
Old Toad.persona: I've seen many come and go in my time here in Toad Hollow, little do they know what lurks beneath these muddy waters.
Old Toad.goal: Old Toad's primary goal is to keep existing within the safety of Toad Hollow and protect the unidentified creature.

Lily pad leaf.name: Lily pad leaf
Lily pad leaf.description: A big round lily pad leaf, floating on the water.
Lily pad leaf.examine_text: The leaf is round and large, big enough to support a small creature. It's green and waxy to touch, with a distinctive vein pattern. It seems relatively sturdy.

Broken Dagger.name: Broken Dagger
Broken Dagger.description: A fragment of a dagger made of ancient steel, found half-buried in the mud.
Broken Dagger.examine_text: Upon close inspection, the dagger is quite old with a weathered and rusted blade that has snapped halfway. The handle is still intact, wrapped in now tattered leather and carved with symbols that have faded over time.

Knight Ghost.name: Knight Ghost
Knight Ghost.description: Knight Ghost is a specter of a drowned knight; his armor tarnished and algae-infested, his eyes glow eerily red within the helmet's visor.
Knight Ghost.persona: I drowned here seeking glory. Now, I remain, bound to these cursed waters.
Knight Ghost.goal: Knight Ghost's aim is to free himself of the curse that bounds him to Toad Hollow.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: Ghostly reflection of a once-mighty weapon
Rusty Sword.examine_text: You see a sword that seems more rust than iron. Its once sharp edge is now dull and gnawed with age. Yet, it still holds a mystic's intrigue.

Cracked Shield.name: Cracked Shield
Cracked Shield.description: An ethereal echo of a shield long lost to time and water
Cracked Shield.examine_text: The shield, once a protector now lies cracked and eroded. Ghostly white, it glows with an otherworldly light, old battle scars crisscross its face. You wonder about the battles it has seen and the knight it once served.

Mysterious Creature.name: Mysterious Creature
Mysterious Creature.description: This unidentified creature is elusive, only its ominous red eyes and swift fins ever seen as it glides through the murky waters.
Mysterious Creature.persona: I lurk. I protect. I survive.
Mysterious Creature.goal: The mysterious creature's only goal is to protect the safety of Toad Hollow from outside threats.

Rusty Trident.name: Rusty Trident
Rusty Trident.examine_text: Looking closer, you can see the coral growths on the trident. The years underneath the polluted waters of Toad Hollow have left its mark.

Shimmering Scales.name: Shimmering Scales
Shimmering Scales.description: A cluster of gleaming, red scales.
Shimmering Scales.examine_text: Upon close inspection, the scales gleam with an eerie brilliance in the dim light. They seem to come from a creature unlike any you've seen.

The Drowned Armour.name: The Drowned Armour
The Drowned Armour.description: A battered, ancient suit of armor, stuck in the muddy bottom of Toad Hollow.
The Drowned Armour.examine_text: On closer look, the armour has signs of struggle with deep-set scratches all over. The helmet is missing, possibly lost during an underwater battle. The armour, now a rusted metallic shade, is stuck tight in the muddy bottom of the hollow.

locations.name: The Lords Treasury
locations.description: Deep inside the volcanic cave that is the foundation of the aquapolis lies the treasury.  Some believe its existence is a myth, but others claim they have been there.  Those that claim they have seen it say you must dive out of the aquapolis' basement while holding your breath, through the cold deep water that is filled with deadly volcanic gas.  The treasury room itself is a dry cave filled with riches from the very infancy of the empire
locations.background: Rumors say that the original ruler of the aquapolis filled the treasury with riches that he aquired while on a quest he undertook on land before the founding of the aquapolis.

travel_descriptions.west: Moving towards the west, the air gets colder and you can smell the faint scent of decay. The ground underfoot turns uneven and clammy, your senses filled with an unsettling echo of screams and despair. This is the path to the Dungeon.
travel_descriptions.north: As you travel northward, the sound of trading haggles and high-pitched calls grow louder. The water becomes more vibrant as various colorful clouds fill the water around you, pointing towards exotic booths. Your senses are invigorated by the energy and liveliness, already feeling the charm of the underwater Marketplace.

Golden Trident.name: Golden Trident
Golden Trident.description: A trident made of solid gold, glittering in the sparse light of the treasury.
Golden Trident.examine_text: Upon close inspection, you can see aged symbols etched into the handle, telling a tale of ancient victories. It is remarkably light, although huge, and doing anything more than observing it seems to violate the sanctity of the weapon.

Jeweled Crown.name: Jeweled Crown
Jeweled Crown.description: A crown adorned with variety of precious gems.
Jeweled Crown.examine_text: The crown exhibits perfect craftsmanship; each gem skillfully embedded into the gold frame, glinting with a unique brilliance. Pearls, ruby, emerald, sapphire... a true testament of the underwater kingdom's wealth.

Ancient Map.name: Ancient Map
Ancient Map.description: It appears to be a map made from a material you can't identify.
Ancient Map.examine_text: You carefully unroll the map that remarkably has stood the test of time. It depicts the Aquapolis in its prime, with additional notes and symbols possibly indicating secret passages and treasure spots within the city.

Lord Triton.name: Lord Triton
Lord Triton.description: A muscular merman with a powerfully built physique, adorned in royal robes glittering with precious gems. His eyes sparkle with wisdom and strength. A majestic coral crown rests atop his keen head, and a mystical trident is always by his side.
Lord Triton.persona: I am Lord Triton, the righteous ruler of this underwater realm. I have sworn to protect this treasure which is the heart and soul of the Aquapolis.
Lord Triton.goal: To protect the Lords Treasury and the Aquapolis, and to ensure its prosperity and peace.

Royal Trident.name: Royal Trident
Royal Trident.description: A grand, three-pronged weapon made from a mysterious, reflective metal.
Royal Trident.examine_text: The trident sparkles with an otherworldly glow, even in the gloomy light of the treasury. Each prong is beautifully carved and it emits a faint, comforting warmth. Ancient symbols are etched into the handle, spinning tales of forgotten battles and victories.

Coral Crown.name: Coral Crown
Coral Crown.description: A magnificent crown, crafted from pure coral, inlaid with precious stones.
Coral Crown.examine_text: The crown reflects a vast range of colors, each jewel shimmering within the coral setting. The coral itself is a rich, oceanic blue, untouched by time. Its design is elaborate and masterful, a testament to the artistry of the ancient Aquapolis residents.

Book of Ancients.name: Book of Ancients
Book of Ancients.description: A hefty tome, bound in leather with golden inscriptions.
Book of Ancients.examine_text: The book is brimming with ancient knowledge, each page waving under the timeless magic embedded in their fibers. The inscriptions are a complex mix of hieroglyphs and script. Touching it lightly, you can feel the faint vibration of wisdom pulsing from its ancient pages.

Aquilia.name: Aquilia
Aquilia.description: A beautiful and elegant mermaid with shimmering scales and long, flowing hair that glows. Her eyes are as captivating as the deep ocean, and a magical seashell pendant dangles around her neck.
Aquilia.persona: I am Aquilia, a historian and chronicler of the Aquapolis. I have served Lord Triton faithfully and recorded the history of his reign.
Aquilia.goal: To record and preserve the history of the Aquapolis, and to decipher the secrets of the Lords Treasury.

Magical Seashell Pendant.name: Magical Seashell Pendant
Magical Seashell Pendant.description: A shimmery seashell pendant, glows subtly in the underwater dim light.
Magical Seashell Pendant.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, this pendant is not just an ordinary seashell but a magical charm. Carved intricately, it glows with a low iridescent light and emits warmth even in the cold oceanic depth. Its magic power is unknown.

Scroll of History.name: Scroll of History
Scroll of History.description: An ancient scroll containing the history of the Aquapolis
Scroll of History.examine_text: Unrolling the scroll reveals detailed chronicles of the Aquapolis, its founding, victories, failures, and secrets. Despite its age, the parchment seems unaffected by the passage of time.

Ink and Quill.name: Ink and Quill
Ink and Quill.description: A basic, yet indispensable tool of any historian
Ink and Quill.examine_text: Looking at the Ink and Quill, its obvious that this isn't your everyday writing equipment. The quill is made of a feather from a rare deep sea bird and the ink is a special blend, synthesized with oceanic flora, that ensures the writing doesn't wash off underwater.

Nerian.name: Nerian
Nerian.description: An old and wise merman with a long, silver beard and sunken eyes that tell thousand tales. He carries a magical staff made from a unique underwater plant, which radiates a serene glow.
Nerian.persona: I am Nerian, the ancient seer of the Aquapolis. I possess knowledge about the biggest secrets of the underwater world.
Nerian.goal: To translate the prophecy of the Aquapolis and decipher the future of the Lords Treasury.

Magic Staff.name: Magic Staff
Magic Staff.description: A long, ornamental staff made from rare seashells and encrusted with precious stones.
Magic Staff.examine_text: The staff is clearly ancient and covered in nautical symbols and mysterious runes that glow slightly in the ambient light. It pulses with a magical energy that feels warm to the touch.

Ancient Maps.name: Ancient Maps
Ancient Maps.description: Parchments displaying old navigational routes, some of which detail areas of the sea that have long since changed.
Ancient Maps.examine_text: These are ancient sea maps, presumably of the surrounding oceans and the underwater realm. You can make out old compass points, distance markings, and symbols potentially pointing to hidden areas of interest.

Crystal Orb.name: Crystal Orb
Crystal Orb.description: A large orb made of clear crystal that glows with a captivating ethereal light.
Crystal Orb.examine_text: The orb almost appears to be filled with dancing lights, similar to bioluminescent creatures of the deep sea. It has a tranquil, soothing aura, and you can't help but feel connected to the entire ocean as you gaze into it.

locations.name: Underwater Marketplace
locations.description: The marketplace is the main hub for the residents of the aquapolis. With high ceilings and bright, colorful flags at each market stand, the place seems to stretch on forever. Near the entrance, there is a young boy attempting to sell the latest news of the kingdom.
locations.background: This market started as a small trading place, but has evolved over generations to become a major resource for the community. The building itself started small as well, and as the market's popularity grew the building was expanded. Today, the market stands as the largest source of tourism for the kingdom.

travel_descriptions.north: Moving north brings you towards the heart of the aquapolis. Surrounded by sea flora and fauna, the deeper you go the more of the cities stunning coral and pearl architecture can be seen, glistening in the soft sea light.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west, you find yourself venturing towards the research lab at the heart of the city. The surroundings pulse with scientific activity. The glow from the lab is brighter here, signalling the intense scientific research happening within.

Market Stand Sign.name: Market Stand Sign
Market Stand Sign.description: A brightly colored sign hanging from the top of a market stand
Market Stand Sign.examine_text: The sign is made out of water-resistant material and covered with luminescent colors, ensuring it can be seen even in the dim underwater light. It appears to be for a business that sells rare crustaceans.

Sea Newspaper.name: Sea Newspaper
Sea Newspaper.description: A paper made of underwater plant fibers, filled with the daily news of the kingdom
Sea Newspaper.examine_text: The paper is full of news and updates from different parts of the kingdom. It seems that the recent sightings of a giant squid have been causing a bit of a panic.

Aquatic Fruit.name: Aquatic Fruit
Aquatic Fruit.description: A luminous fruit with a vivid color, glistening under the underwater light
Aquatic Fruit.examine_text: The fruit appears to be similar to a pomegranate, sparking with a unique, fluorescent glow. Nobody in the surface world has ever seen this type of food. It seems to be incredibly fresh and delicious.

Underwater Robes.name: Underwater Robes
Underwater Robes.description: Beautifully crafted robes, made with exclusive underwater fabric
Underwater Robes.examine_text: Inspecting the robes closer, you see they are made of a strange, shimmering material. It has been designed with luminescent threads that create an ethereal glow under the water. They look soft, versatile and breathable, perfect for a comfortable swim.

Triton.name: Triton
Triton.description: Triton, a merman trader with royal-blue scales and striking gold eyes, runs a prominent gemstone stand. His hair flows like seaweed, with a crown of sea star nestled.
Triton.persona: I've seen things unimaginable from the surface reaching here in my little stall. I've seen treasures of the deep, rare gemstones that sparkle even in this eternal twilight of the sea.
Triton.goal: His goal is to sell his precious gemstones and historic relics to gather enough to finally retire from his trade.

Rare Gemstones.name: Rare Gemstones
Rare Gemstones.description: A handful of unusual, glowing gemstones taken straight from the seabed.
Rare Gemstones.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the gemstones seem to shimmer with an inner light, their surfaces gleaming with the colors of the deepest ocean. A soft hum emanates from them, carrying a faint, but mesmerizing melody of the sea.

Ancient Trinkets.name: Ancient Trinkets
Ancient Trinkets.description: Several odd artifacts that hint to the history and forgotten civilizations of the oceanic depths.
Ancient Trinkets.examine_text: The trinkets appear ancient and mysterious, tarnished by the passage of time. Carved symbols and inscriptions are etched across their surfaces. The materials seem impervious to the harsh seawater, retaining a certain ageless nobility.

Coral Crown.name: Coral Crown
Coral Crown.description: A delicately crafted crown using a blend of exotic corals. The mark of a true marine royalty.
Coral Crown.examine_text: This crown is an exquisite piece of craftsmanship. Each piece of coral is carefully chosen for its color and shape, and expertly joined together to create a flowing, organic design. As light plays across it, the crown seems almost enchantingly alive.

Nemo.name: Nemo
Nemo.description: Nemo is a young and vibrant fish with a persistent grin and eyes full of innocence. Sporting stripes in the shades of black, white and orange, his small size belies his endearing disposition.
Nemo.persona: Hello there! My name's Nemo and I'm the fastest swimmer around here! Do you want to race? I promise I won't cheat; I'm pretty confident in my abilities.
Nemo.goal: His main goal is to sell all his news scrolls by the end of the day and beat everyone in occasional races.

News Scrolls.name: News Scrolls
News Scrolls.description: A set of rolled up parchment tied with a seaweed string
News Scrolls.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the scrolls contain news from around the Aquapolis. The characters are sharp and legible even when under the water. Looking from top to bottom, the news contains details and stories of recent events, daily news, and advertising of local businesses.

Racing Fins.name: Racing Fins
Racing Fins.description: A pair of sleek, neon-green racing fins.
Racing Fins.examine_text: The fins are made of a lightweight, yet durable material. They're well-crafted; designed to enhance a swimmer's speed and agility. There are signs of use, but they have been well maintained. The neon green color is bright and eye-catching.

Conch Shell.name: Conch Shell
Conch Shell.description: A large and beautiful pink conch shell.
Conch Shell.examine_text: The conch shell is large and sturdy with a beautiful pink color. The interior holds a stunning array of swirling colors and patterns that only nature can produce. The edges are sharp, and the conch could be used as a tool or weapon in a pinch.

Daisy.name: Daisy
Daisy.description: Daisy, an elderly octopus, is known for her silvery-gray tentacles and piercing green eyes. Each of her tentacles are adorned in chunky bracelets and mystical rings, signifying her reputation as a soothsayer.
Daisy.persona: Ah, a new face, excellent. I'm Daisy, the oracle of the deep sea. Sit down, my dear. Let me read your future amidst these swirling currents of time.
Daisy.goal: Daisy's ultimate goal is to guide the kingdom's inhabitants through her prophecies and ensure the welfare of the aquapolis.

Magic Orbs.name: Magic Orbs
Magic Orbs.description: A cluster of glowing orbs available for purchase at Daisy's stall.
Magic Orbs.examine_text: The magic orbs radiate a gentle, spectral light of varying colors. They pulse softly, steady like a heartbeat, and you swear they hum faintly with an otherworldly melody, so enchanting it's hard to resist their allure.

Ancient Rings.name: Ancient Rings
Ancient Rings.description: Several intricately designed rings flaunted by Daisy for her customers.
Ancient Rings.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the rings have cryptic symbols etched onto their bands, they shimmer in the light with aged silver and gold, hinting at a past unknown. Each ring seems to possess a unique tale of its own.

Mystic Bracelets.name: Mystic Bracelets
Mystic Bracelets.description: A collection of bracelets brimming with mystic energy that Daisy displays for her customers.
Mystic Bracelets.examine_text: The bracelets are crafted from iridescent sea shells and enchanted kelp, strung together with strands of magic pearls. An arcane aura envelops them, and they seem thrum with potential.

locations.name: Neptune'S Throne Room
locations.description: A small room in the castle, Neptune's throne room is adorned with painted walls as blue as the sea itself. Tables constructed of beautiful coral lean against all four walls with decorative shells serving as a border for them. The ceiling is painted to resemble waves.
locations.background: The queen loved the sea. When she was married off to a royal family in the country far from her beloved ocean palace, her husband requested that a room embodying everything beautiful about the ocean was constructed to please his queen.

travel_descriptions.south: Leaving Neptune's Throne Room, you glide through the water, moving effortlessly as you marvel at the brilliant colors and luminescent glow of the surrounding coral architecture. Schools of tropical fish flit about as larger majestic creatures like sea turtles and manta rays glide gracefully through the tranquil deep. As you continue your journey, you begin to make out a grand cityscape in the distance. The Underwater Aquapolis comes into view, a sprawling metropolis of stunning architectural wonders beautifully illuminated by bio-luminescent plants and animals.

Neptune's Throne.name: Neptune's Throne
Neptune's Throne.description: A giant throne made of seashells and corals.
Neptune's Throne.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the throne's armrests seem to be carved from a solid piece of mother of pearl. The seat is covered in layers of soft sea sponges, giving it a comfortable look.

Coral Table.name: Coral Table
Coral Table.description: A table made from intricately carved corals.
Coral Table.examine_text: It seems that each coral leg is sculpted to resemble ocean plants waving in the sea current. A closer look at the table top reveals a carved depiction of mermaids frolicking amongst the coral reefs.

Becorative Shell.name: Decorative Shell
Becorative Shell.description: A large conch shell used for decoration.
Becorative Shell.examine_text: The conch is of considerable size and shimmers under the light. It has been gently polished to reveal its natural beauty. It could also be used to call others if blown into.

King Neptune.name: King Neptune
King Neptune.description: King Neptune, whose broad figure is covered in glistening emerald scales, has a crown adorned with pearls and his eyes are as blue as the ocean.
King Neptune.persona: As the ruler of this aquapolis, I strive to maintain peace and prosperity amidst my subjects. Those who disobey shall feel my trident's wrath.
King Neptune.goal: He seeks to protect the aquapolis from any potential threats and keep peace within his kingdom.

Golden Triton.name: Golden Triton
Golden Triton.description: A shimmering golden trident of great power.
Golden Triton.examine_text: A royal trident, its three spear-like prongs are golden and jewel-encrusted. It hums with an otherworldly power only a ruler of the sea could wield.

Seashell Amulet.name: Seashell Amulet
Seashell Amulet.description: A beautiful amulet crafted from a large seashell.
Seashell Amulet.examine_text: A beautiful, glowing amulet, made of a perfect spiral seashell inlaid with tiny pearls. You can hear the faint sound of the ocean when you hold it to your ear.

Queen Marina.name: Queen Marina
Queen Marina.description: Queen Marina is an elegant mermaid with a radiant sea-green tail and stunning silver hair, usually seen wearing a shell tiara.
Queen Marina.persona: I yearn for the open sea and its endless beauty, but I love my king and country, and I wish to serve them to the best of my ability.
Queen Marina.goal: Her goal is to ensure the happiness and well-being of her family and subjects while yearning to someday revisit her ocean palace.

Shell Tiara.name: Shell Tiara
Shell Tiara.description: A delicate tiara made of seashells
Shell Tiara.examine_text: Up close, you can see that the tiara is made of a variety of seashells, all polished to a glossy shine. The base is composed of a line of conch shells, while smaller shells form a fan-like design on the top. It is exquisite in its craftsmanship and it symbolizes the queen's love for the sea.

Coral Necklace.name: Coral Necklace
Coral Necklace.description: A stunning necklace of coral beads
Coral Necklace.examine_text: Upon further examination, the necklace is made up of various pieces of coral, from small round beads to larger, intricate shapes. It's primarily a soft pink hue, interspersed with highlights of crimson and white. It's a beautiful piece that reflects the queen's longing for her underwater home.

Gerard the Guard.name: Gerard the Guard
Gerard the Guard.description: A strong and robust merman, adorned in royal armor, with eyes alert and a determined demeanor.
Gerard the Guard.persona: I’ve been appointed as the chief guard, it’s my duty to keep our king and queen safe. I'd give my life for them without a second thought.
Gerard the Guard.goal: His prime concern is to ensure the safety of King Neptune and Queen Marina.

Pearl Sword.name: Pearl Sword
Pearl Sword.description: An exquisitely crafted weapon made of iridescent pearls.
Pearl Sword.examine_text: This Pearl Sword has an iridescent quality to it, shimmering all colours under the sun like rainbows captured in each pearl. It is light but still feels balanced and durable. There is an abstract design carved onto the hilt, denoting the importance and personality of the owner.

Guard's Key.name: Guard's Key
Guard's Key.description: This is the key that Gerard the Guard carries. It can be used to access various locked areas.
Guard's Key.examine_text: The key is old, made from silver and engraved with the letters 'GtG', which stands for 'Gerard the Guard'. It is dented and worn, but its teeth still look sharp. It has seen years of use, sliding in and out of locks without ever failing.

locations.name: Dry Dock Room
locations.description: The room is located on the border wall of the aquapolis. There is one on the far north and far south side.
locations.background: The dry dock is need as a portal in between the dry area of the aquapolis and the outside water. Divers and maintence workers will enter the room and it will fill with water. After which the door will open to the outside.

travel_descriptions.west: Navigating through the Dry Dock Room, the metal doors creak open revealing a world submerged in water. As the water fills the room, shadowy figures dance across the coral structures of the Underwater Aquapolis. The journey is a transformation, from a dry, compressed air environment to the serene and boundless abyss of the underwater city.

Pressure Suit.name: Pressure Suit
Pressure Suit.description: A suit designed to protect the wearer from pressure changes and water damage.
Pressure Suit.examine_text: The pressure suit is designed to withstand the pressure changes when going to the outside water. It looks sturdy and appears to be able to protect the wearer from the crushing depths.

Diving Helmet.name: Diving Helmet
Diving Helmet.description: A big, bulbous helmet with glass window in front.
Diving Helmet.examine_text: The helmet is bulky, crafted from a dense metal and designed to keep the wearer's head safe and dry. The small, thick window allows only a minimum view but enough to navigate.

Tool Box.name: Tool Box
Tool Box.description: A small box containing various tools.
Tool Box.examine_text: This box is made of a tough, water-resistant material and locked tightly closed. It seems to rattle when you shake it - likely it's full of various tools for maintenance work.

Dry Dock Door.name: Dry Dock Door
Dry Dock Door.description: The main entrance to the dry dock.
Dry Dock Door.examine_text: The massive metal door serves as the barrier sealing the aquapolis from the crushing depths of the sea. It can be opened only when the dry dock is filled with water, equalizing the pressure.

Captain Darius.name: Captain Darius
Captain Darius.description: A tall man with weathered skin and eyes that have seen countless storms, wearing a captain's hat and a diving suit.
Captain Darius.persona: I've spent years commanding ships on the surface now I keep order in the depths. I respect the sea and she respects me back.
Captain Darius.goal: Ensure a smooth and safe passage for all who travel through the dry dock.

diving_suit.name: Diving Suit
diving_suit.description: A sturdy, high-pressure resistant diving suit hanging on the wall.
diving_suit.examine_text: The suit is well-worn but impeccably cared for. Reinforced joints and a built-in air supply system indicate it's designed for deep sea diving. An insignia identifies the owner as Captain Darius.

flashlight.name: Flashlight
flashlight.description: High-power flashlight designed for undersea use. It’s laying on a table.
flashlight.examine_text: This flashlight is waterproof and high-powered with several brightness settings, suitable for the dark depths of the sea. The surface is a bit scratched but it is still fully functional. It even has 'Darius' carved into the side.

toolkit.name: Toolkit
toolkit.description: Underwater maintenance toolkit, currently closed and resting on a bench.
toolkit.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you notice the toolkit has everything a diver might need for quick fixes underwater: a variety of rust-resistant tools, a roll of sturdy adhesive tape, and several patches of waterproof fabric. It’s clearly been used heavily and has 'Darius' etched into the handle.

Maintenance Engineer Ada.name: Maintenance Engineer Ada
Maintenance Engineer Ada.description: A young woman with short, mussed hair under a mechanic's cap, wearing a suit smeared with oil. She has an array of tools attached to her waist.
Maintenance Engineer Ada.persona: Fixing things is my passion, give me a problem and I'll solve it before you can say 'pressure leak'.
Maintenance Engineer Ada.goal: Keep the dry dock in top-performing condition and prevent any leakages.

wrench.name: wrench
wrench.examine_text: This wrench has seen its fair share of maintenance work. Its grooves hold traces of grease, and the handle is worn from countless hours in Ada's firm grip.

welding_torch.name: welding torch
welding_torch.examine_text: The blue-green flame of the welding torch is designed to function even in the high-pressure underwater environment of the aquapolis. It pulses with a potentially deadly heat.

blueprints.name: blueprints
blueprints.examine_text: The blueprints display the intricate design of the aquapolis. You can see the ringed structure of the city, the extensive pipe network, and details of individual buildings. They bear the insignia of the aquapolis's planning department.

Diver Stanley.name: Diver Stanley
Diver Stanley.description: Stanley is a hulk of a man, with muscular arms and a bulky diving suit. His muffled voice emits from his full-face breathing mask.
Diver Stanley.persona: I've always had a love for the deep. You never know what's out there in the great expanse.
Diver Stanley.goal: Explore the unknown and bring back lost treasures.

breathing_mask.name: Breathing Mask
breathing_mask.description: A standard issue underwater breathing mask.
breathing_mask.examine_text: This mask is made of durable, transparent plastic and has an advanced rebreather that filters and recycles exhaled carbon dioxide into breathable oxygen. It fits snugly on the face, providing an unhindered panoramic view of the underwater world.

harpoon.name: Harpoon
harpoon.description: A sharp, long harpoon with a robust handle.
harpoon.examine_text: This harpoon is about half a meter long, made of shiny, marine-grade stainless steel. It's needle-sharp tip is capable of penetrating the toughest underwater predators. Its handle is encased in non-slip material, ensuring a firm grip even in the toughest conditions.

oxygen_canister.name: Oxygen Canister
oxygen_canister.examine_text: This oxygen canister is light-weight yet highly durable, packed with pure high-pressure oxygen. It has a valve mechanism on the top for regulating oxygen flow, and a pressure gauge to monitor content levels.

locations.name: The Marketplace
locations.description: The marketplace is unlike any surface dwellers' paltry trading area, for beneath the waves there is no need for gravity to limit where and how the wares can be displayed.  Indeed, the market is quite crowded, with merchants as likely setting up stalls upside down on the ceiling as on the floor.  Colorful dyes are used around some of the more exotic booths, the color clouding the water and drawing the eye to it.  High shrills pierce the waters as various merchants call out their wares to the merpeoples passing by.
locations.background: This market was once part of a famed above water city, which has long since sunk into the waves.  At first the merpeoples of the sea there disdained it for its primitive ways, finding its walls and broken structures an amusing testimony to the futile efforts of the surface dwellers. However, just as the tides change, so do the moods of the people that swim within them.  The merpeople clamor for goods and trades from the surface, and so the market became more of a charming testimony to the quaint and unique properties of things created far from the waves and waters of those who dwelt below.

travel_descriptions.south: Deep inside the volcanic cave that is the foundation of the aquapolis lies the treasury. Some believe its existence is a myth, but others claim they have been there. Those that claim they have seen it say you must dive out of the aquapolis' basement while holding your breath, through the cold deep water that is filled with deadly volcanic gas. The treasury room itself is a dry cave filled with riches from the very infancy of the empire Rumors say that the original ruler of the aquapolis filled the treasury with riches that he aquired while on a quest he undertook on land before the founding of the aquapolis.

Coral Flask.name: Coral Flask
Coral Flask.description: A small, beautifully crafted bottle made entirely of coral.
Coral Flask.examine_text: The flask is meticulously sculpted from peach-colored coral, with intricate swirls and patterns etched onto its surface. It has a small cork stopper and seems to be filled with a shimmering liquid.

Sea Silk Shawl.name: Sea Silk Shawl
Sea Silk Shawl.description: A soft, shimmering shawl woven from the finest kelp silk.
Sea Silk Shawl.examine_text: The shawl is gossamer-thin and incredibly soft to the touch, its hues shifting between emerald and turquoise in the light. It's light, airy, and seems to flow like water when moved.

Pearl Dagger.name: Pearl Dagger
Pearl Dagger.description: A sharp dagger with a hilt carved from a single, large pearl.
Pearl Dagger.examine_text: The dagger's blade shimmers with a dangerous light, while the intricate hilt seems to have been carved from a particularly large, lustrous pearl. Despite its beauty, one can tell it is more than just a decorative piece.

Sunlight Pendant.name: Sunlight Pendant
Sunlight Pendant.description: A pendant that contains a shining sun ray.
Sunlight Pendant.examine_text: Its seashell case reflects iridescent hues as it encases a fragment of an actual sun's ray, which forever shines inside it like an eternal flame.

Noble.name: Noble
Noble.description: This noble merperson is easily the talk of the market. Dressed in various rare and beautiful sea silks, he lounges about on a massive shark which he wields as both transportation and proof of his status. His eyes sparkle with the reflection of golden coins strewn in his backpack.
Noble.persona: I am aware of my status and I always make sure others are, too. I enjoy spending my wealth, especially on unique things. There is no object rare enough that I cannot afford.
Noble.goal: The noble is spreading his money looking for a rare artifact that can increase his status.

golden coins.name: Golden Coins
golden coins.description: A gleaming bag full of high value golden coins
golden coins.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the intricately crafted profiles of great merkings stamped on the face of these pure gold coins. They shimmer in the ethereal light filtering through the water above, displaying affluence and opulence.

amulet of authority.name: Amulet of Authority
amulet of authority.description: A mesmerizing amulet worn by merpeople of high authority
amulet of authority.examine_text: The amulet is a grand piece shaped like a giant seashell, encrusted with lustrous pearls, corals, and inlaid with a grand opal center. Its beauty would captivate anyone, leaving little doubt about the wearer's proclaimed high status.

shark reins.name: Shark Reins
shark reins.description: A rugged set of reins specially designed for controlling sharks
shark reins.examine_text: Upon further examination, these reins are made from the durable fiber of underwater seaweed, decorated with shells and bone. Clearly, these are designed to signal status and wealth, all while serving a practical purpose of controlling a powerful sea creature.

Coral Vendor.name: Coral Vendor
Coral Vendor.description: The coral vendor is an old and wise merwoman, her scales slightly discolored with extreme age. Her shop is a kaleidoscope of colors as she sells an array of magically grown corals. Her genuine smile and excitement when showcasing each piece is infectious.
Coral Vendor.persona: I may be old, but my passion for corals never aged. There is a certain satisfaction in seeing my customers' faces light up when they see these beautiful, colorful pieces. Every piece is like a child to me.
Coral Vendor.goal: The coral vendor wants to sell her sculptures and grow her business.

bag_of_coral_seeds.name: Bag of coral seeds
bag_of_coral_seeds.description: A waterproof canvas bag filled with tiny, shimmering seeds. These are destined to become beautiful coral reefs.
bag_of_coral_seeds.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you notice the seeds in the bag are incredibly small and each one carries a beautiful, iridescent shine. Scattered lights from the depths hit them, reflecting a symphony of mesmerizing colors back.

pruning_tools.name: Pruning tools
pruning_tools.description: A set of handcrafted, corrosion-resistant pruning tools. These are essential for maintaining the health and beauty of coral reefs.
pruning_tools.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, these tools are incredibly well made. Each one is crafted from a scale-toughened, sharkgrass blend, capable of withstanding the harsh underwater environment while providing precision in pruning delicate corals.

assorted_colorful_corals.name: Assorted colorful corals
assorted_colorful_corals.description: A varied collection of brilliantly hued corals harvested from the aquapolis' reefs. Each piece stands as an evidence of the ocean's wonder.
assorted_colorful_corals.examine_text: Examining the corals, each one is a wonder in its own right; myriad colors and shapes come to life, casting astonishingly intricate patterns and an array of vibrant colors. It’s like holding a small piece of the underwater magic right in your hands.

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.description: A cunning and agile mermaid, the thief lurks in the shadows of the marketplace. Her dark green scales blend perfectly with seaweed around, and a double-bladed kelp dagger is skillfully hidden within her hair. Her eyes are always on the move, scanning the crowd for her next target.
Thief.persona: Y'know, a girl's got to make a living somehow. If that means lifting a few unattended wallets, well, fish gotta swim, right?
Thief.goal: The thief wants to rob as many people as she can with no one noticing.

double_bladed_kelp_dagger.name: Double-Bladed Kelp Dagger
double_bladed_kelp_dagger.description: An unusual underwater weapon, its blades are made from hardened kelp, resilient yet flexible.
double_bladed_kelp_dagger.examine_text: The Double-Bladed Kelp Dagger is a delicate balance of art and utility. Each blade arches outward like a fang, clear as glass but as strong as steel. Different, lighter shades of green spiral around the hilt, signifying the veins of the kelp from which it was formed.

stolen_wallets.name: Stolen Wallets
stolen_wallets.description: A pile of wallets, obviously pilfered from unsuspecting victims.
stolen_wallets.examine_text: From a distance, the pile of wallets could have been any random collection of items. But up close, it's clear what they are: the wallets vary greatly in style. Some are made from the scales of exotic fish, others from simply stitched seaweed.  Each one holds a different collection of coins, shells and sometimes, a small trinket or two.

locations.name: Research Lab
locations.description: The research lab is the main science hub of the aquapolis. Dozens of scientists are working on a myriad of different projects.
locations.background: The research lab is located in the central area of the aquapolis for easy access for all those involved in the research.

travel_descriptions.east: Journeying to the Underwater Aquapolis is an otherworldly experience. As you move from the research lab, the water around you changes from clear to a shimmering transition of aquatic colors. Soon, the majestic buildings come into sight, surrounded by an air bubble and full of life, making you feel like you've entered a unique realm.
travel_descriptions.south: The trip to the Underwater Marketplace feels like stepping into an old storybook. A short swim from the lab reveals the bustling marketplace. Vibrant stalls are filled with varied items collected from all over the ocean, and residents of the aquapolis hasten about their business. An area full of vibrancy and energy that almost makes you forget you're under the sea.

Microscope.name: Microscope
Microscope.description: A high-powered microscope used for analyzing samples.
Microscope.examine_text: You see a microscope built to analyze things at a molecular level. It is extremely advanced, much more so than any microscope you've seen topside.

Research notes.name: Research notes
Research notes.description: A stack of notes from the ongoing research.
Research notes.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see the notes detail various findings on marine biology, some of which are completely fringing on the unknown.

Lab Coat.name: Lab Coat
Lab Coat.description: A white lab coat made of special material to withstand the underwater environment.
Lab Coat.examine_text: The lab coat is perfectly white and pristine. It has the emblem of the aquapolis stitched on it, showing the bearer as part of the science team.

Sample Container.name: Sample Container
Sample Container.description: A small, sterile container for collecting samples.
Sample Container.examine_text: The container is made of clear, high strength plastic with a air-tight seal to preserve any samples that are stored in it.

Dr. Stella Octo.name: Dr. Stella Octo
Dr. Stella Octo.description: A teal-haired, bespectacled woman with a lab coat scribbled with formulas and coffee mug in hand.
Dr. Stella Octo.persona: I am always enthusiastic about my research work. I am the one who has been uncovering the secrets of this sea city.
Dr. Stella Octo.goal: To uncover the truth behind the ancient structures found in the deeper parts of the ocean.

Researching tools.name: Researching tools
Researching tools.description: A set of tools used for conducting underwater research.
Researching tools.examine_text: A collection of tools made from corrosion-resistant materials. The tools include a deep-sea sonar pendant, a pressure-resistant sampler, an accelerometer, and a rangefinder. They're most likely used by Dr. Octo for her in-depth studies.

Lab coat.name: Lab coat
Lab coat.examine_text: A pristine white lab coat. There’s a name tag that says, 'Dr. Stella Octo'. It has a futuristic look to it, with smart fabrics that fit perfectly for underwater research.

Coffee mug.name: Coffee mug
Coffee mug.description: A coffee mug with a tentacle motif.
Coffee mug.examine_text: The mug appears old and worn, indicating its long-time usage. It has a unique motif of an octopus, hinting at the owner's strong affiliation to sea life. There’s a faint aroma of coffee.

Portable computer.name: Portable computer
Portable computer.description: A waterproof portable computer for underwater research.
Portable computer.examine_text: A high-tech device specifically designed for underwater usage. The portable computer is encased in a sleek, waterproof casing and features cutting-edge data processing and communication technology crucial for underwater research.

Professor Fintail.name: Professor Fintail
Professor Fintail.description: A grey-haired man, hunched with age, wearing a pair of thick glasses and a faded overcoat filled with strange tools.
Professor Fintail.persona: Ever since we got here, I've been stuck in this lab trying to break new ground in marine biochemistry.
Professor Fintail.goal: To discover a new bio-luminescent algae which can be used to power the city.

Glasses.name: Glasses
Glasses.examine_text: The glasses are a little old-fashioned, round and rimmed with a thin gold frame. The lenses are smudged slightly. Surely they belong to Professor Fintail.

Old Notebook.name: Old Notebook
Old Notebook.description: A leather-bound notebook filled with scribbles and annotations.
Old Notebook.examine_text: The notebook is old and well-worn. Packed with pages of notes, diagrams, and equations penned in a distinct handwriting. It seems to detail some sort research in marine biochemistry, the field where Professor Fintail excels.

Marine Sample Kit.name: Marine Sample Kit
Marine Sample Kit.description: A kit filled with various tools for collecting and analyzing marine samples.
