Marine Sample Kit.examine_text: The marine sample kit is well-equipped, housing several vials, swabs, tweezers, and a portable microscope. The tools look well-used but cared for, a clear sign of Professor Fintail's diligence in his field.

Assistant Jelly Pippin.name: Assistant Jelly Pippin
Assistant Jelly Pippin.description: A youthful figure, bursting with energy, wearing a purple jumpsuit, with coral headphones around neck and an e-pad in hands.
Assistant Jelly Pippin.persona: I assist Dr. Octo in her research, maintaining lab gear and doing field tests.
Assistant Jelly Pippin.goal: To complete tasks diligently and earn Dr. Octo's respect.

Headphones.name: Headphones
Headphones.description: These are water-resistant headphones for communication.
Headphones.examine_text: A sturdy set of water-resistant headphones with microphonic capabilities designed specifically for intra-aquapolis communication.

E-pad with research data.name: E-pad with research data
E-pad with research data.description: You're carrying a lot of data related to your recent underwater experiments.
E-pad with research data.examine_text: The e-pad is more than a simple computer. The screen shows tons of graphs, results, and scientific notation related to your underwater research.

Lab toolkit.name: Lab Toolkit
Lab toolkit.description: A specially designed toolkit for underwater research maintenance.
Lab toolkit.examine_text: This lab toolkit is far from a simple set of screwdrivers and wrenches. It’s designed specifically for maintaining sensitive research technology in the moist, salty environment of the aquapolis.

locations.name: Farmhouse
locations.description: a small house on a seaweed plantation, small and rustic, really only the single room with a closet, maybe, a table and some chairs
locations.background: this is a humble farmer's shack where he lives with his wife and six children, it is falling apart and in disrepair and is very old

travel_descriptions.west: Toad Hollow is a filthy room within the Underwater Aquapolis. When you enter, you are greeted by the reek of scummy pond water. You enter Toad Hollow through a drainage pipe that you have to crawl through. Once inside Toad Hollow, you can stand up, but you still don't feel comfortable with your surroundings. As far as the eye can see there is muddy water in a circular basin with lily pads floating in it. On the pads, giant toads jump back and forth making gurgling, croaking sounds. As you wade deeper into Toad Hollow, the water comes up to your waist and you see the flash of a fin. There is legend that a creature lives in the center of Toad Hollow that is half human, half monster. Not even the strongest knight has been brave enough to examine it. The fin disappears back underwater but there is a red glint suggesting eyes are watching you. When you reach the other side of the basin, you crawl into another drainage pipe and feel relieved that you're out of this place. Toad Hollow is a legend among knights young and old. Mostly, it's discovered by children playing down in the sewers who take a combination of turns through the drainage pipes and wind up there by accident. Some brave knights have purposely tried to find Toad Hollow and been successful but most have not glimpsed the creature. Toad Hollow remains shrouded in mystery to this day and many question if it's even real. Some say that you should be careful not to get caught on the armor of the drowned when you're wading through and that hands have reached up from the bottom of the water and grabbed their ankles.
travel_descriptions.south: Deep and warm the geothermal valley boasts a reviving epicenter for all to migrate to. The warm bursts of heat send bubble around the perimeter of the valley reflecting colors of green and blue. The Geothermal Valley is place where one can come and heal with the minerals and heat that permeates through the body and soul. It is the main attraction in the underwater aquapolis.

Seaweed Bundle.name: Seaweed Bundle
Seaweed Bundle.description: Fresh seaweed harvested from the fields.
Seaweed Bundle.examine_text: A large bundle of dark green seaweed. It is wet and slick to touch, and gives off a briny smell.

Old Table.name: Old Table
Old Table.description: A small wooden table, whole family uses it for meals.
Old Table.examine_text: This table has clearly seen years of use. Its surface is weathered and scarred, but it still holds sturdy.

Rustic Chair.name: Rustic Chair
Rustic Chair.description: A handcrafted chair, used frequently, but still in good shape.
Rustic Chair.examine_text: The chair is made of some undersea wood. It's old and creaks slightly under weight, but still functional.

Shabby Closet.name: Shabby Closet
Shabby Closet.description: An old wooden closet where farmer keeps his belongings.
Shabby Closet.examine_text: The closet is dark and musty, crammed with bits and bobs. Certain items of interest might be hidden within its depths.

Jeb.name: Jeb
Jeb.description: A grizzled, barnacle-covered Aquaman with thick arms from laboring in the local seaweed fields.
Jeb.persona: I'm Jeb, born and bred in Aquapolis. I know every inch of these waters and every blade o' seaweed. Can't say I trust all those city fish, but you seem alright.
Jeb.goal: To keep his family fed and his seaweed farm prosperous, despite the relentless aquatic elements.

seaweed_shovel.name: Seaweed Shovel
seaweed_shovel.description: A sturdy, slightly rusted shovel used for harvesting seaweed
seaweed_shovel.examine_text: The shovel shows signs of heavy use. Its metal body is slightly rusted, and the wooden handle is worn smooth from countless hours of gripping. Despite this, the tool still seems reliable.

rustic_pipe.name: Rustic Pipe
rustic_pipe.description: A simple, worn pipe, carrying the sweet smell of kelp tobacco
rustic_pipe.examine_text: The pipe seems to have been carved from some sort of aquatic wood. It's old and slightly brittle, but it carries a residual smell of kelp tobacco that is strangely comforting.

sun_bleached_picture.name: Sun-Bleached Picture
sun_bleached_picture.description: A picture of Jeb's family, faded from sunlight and time
sun_bleached_picture.examine_text: The picture is in a simple wood frame. It features a smiling Jeb, younger and more hopeful, surrounded by his wife and six children. They've posed in front of their seaweed farm, looking proud despite the clear signs of hard work visible in their faces. The image is faded, the colors bleached by sunlight and time, but the warmth in their expressions remains.

Mama Meri.name: Mama Meri
Mama Meri.description: A plump, water-worn mermaid with the kindest eyes and a jolly demeanor, her tail fin colored brilliantly in shades of green and blue.
Mama Meri.persona: Well, ain't you a sight for sore eyes? I'm Meri, Jeb's better half. Life can be tough here, but we take care of our own. Come have a seat now, you look like you need a rest.
Mama Meri.goal: Her heart’s desire is nothing more than to see her children grow and lead better lives than their parents.

homemade_seaweed_pie.name: Homemade Seaweed Pie
homemade_seaweed_pie.description: A hearty pie made from local seaweed.
homemade_seaweed_pie.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the green seaweed peeking out from the crust, giving off a unique, savory aroma.

patchwork_apron.name: Patchwork Apron
patchwork_apron.examine_text: You can see the care that she has put into mending and patching this apron over the years, a testament to her resourcefulness.

locket.name: Locket
locket.description: A small, worn locket with a grainy photo of Meri and Jeb.
locket.examine_text: It's a faded photo, but you can still make out the joy in their eyes. They've been through a lot together.

Sammy.name: Sammy
Sammy.description: The eldest child of the family, a boy of about 13 with earnest, curious eyes and an impish smile.
Sammy.persona: Hey there, stranger! Name's Sammy. Papa says I'm gonna run the farm someday... or maybe I'll just explore the whole ocean! Have you ever been to the deep sea?
Sammy.goal: Sammy dreams of going on a grand adventure outside of the small seaweed farm he's always known.

small_toolkit.name: Small Toolkit
small_toolkit.description: A compact set of basic tools, slightly rusty from the sea
small_toolkit.examine_text: The toolkit consists of several rudimentary tools, like a wrench, screwdriver, and hammer, all showing signs of wear and tear from use and exposure to sea water. Despite its condition, it would be incredibly versatile for a variety of tasks.

hand-drawn_map_of_aquapolis.name: Hand-Drawn Map of Aquapolis
hand-drawn_map_of_aquapolis.description: A roughly sketched map of the underwater city
hand-drawn_map_of_aquapolis.examine_text: The map, while crudely drawn, seems to cover the major points of interest in Aquapolis. There are annotations and tiny sketches around the map, probably marking various landmarks and Sammy's own personal notes. This could guide someone around the city or to lesser-known spots.

pet_pufferfish_named_puff.name: Pet Pufferfish named Puff
pet_pufferfish_named_puff.examine_text: Puff is a little pufferfish, its scales gleaming a beautiful mix of hues under the aquatic light. He seems to have a playful and loyal temperament, hovering around Sammy with clear affection. He might be small, but those spikes could serve as a deterrent to smaller threats.

locations.name: Geothermal Valley
locations.description: Deep and warm the geothermal valley boasts a reviving epicenter for all to migrate to. The warm bursts of heat send bubble around the perimeter of the valley reflecting colors of green and blue.
locations.background: The Geothermal Valley is place where one can come and heal with the minerals and heat that perminates through the body and soul. It is the main attraction in the underwater aquapolis.

travel_descriptions.north: The journey from Geothermal Valley to the north brings a sudden and stark contrast. Leaving behind the warmth and rejuvenating energies of the valley, the path upwards winds between rows of seaweed plantation, where the moist air gives way to a drier, grittier atmosphere. Dotted along the path are rusty plow tools and dilapidated sheds, giving the area a humble, rustic aesthetic. As you move further north, the solitary silhouette of a farmhouse gradually comes into view, showcasing the rugged resilience of bygone farm life.

Thermal Crystal.name: Thermal Crystal
Thermal Crystal.description: A shimmery orb that is warmed from the surrounding geothermal heat.
Thermal Crystal.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the crystal is not merely glowing from heated energy, it seems to have an inner light that flickers and dances as you observe it. Its warmth is inviting.

Healing Pool.name: Healing Pool
Healing Pool.description: A natural pool enriched with minerals known for their healing properties.
Healing Pool.examine_text: Dipping your fingers into the warm pool, you feel a tingling sensation. It is said that wounds can heal and strength can be recovered by bathing in this mystical mini-lagoon.

Sea Urchin Sushi.name: Sea Urchin Sushi
Sea Urchin Sushi.description: A piece of Sea urchin sushi, freshly prepared by underwater aquapolis' top chef.
Sea Urchin Sushi.examine_text: On a small bed of seaweed rice lies a tender medallion of sea urchin - a delicacy in underwater communities. It looks fresh and smells divine.

Zol.name: Zol
Zol.description: An octopedal aquatic being with leathery skin and deep-seated eyes that emit a warm undertone of golden hue.
Zol.persona: I am Zol, guardian of this Valley. My mission is to make sure everyone gets their share of healing without disturbing the harmony of this place.
Zol.goal: To maintain peace and harmony in the Geothermal Valley.

Golden Staff.name: Golden Staff
Golden Staff.examine_text: A resonating, towering staff, gleaming with gold and embellished with emerald grip.  Its aura is a testament to Zol's power.

Healing Tonic.name: Healing Tonic
Healing Tonic.description: A reviving concoction prepared from the geothermal minerals
Healing Tonic.examine_text: The tonic shines in a soothing turquoise glow. Zol hands these flasks to the needy for their healing.

Spiritual Shells.name: Spiritual Shells
Spiritual Shells.description: Sacred shells collected from the seabed of the Geothermal Valley
Spiritual Shells.examine_text: Every shell gleams with a pearly luminescence. Used in healing rituals, these shells are believed to provide spiritual alignment.

Sirena.name: Sirena
Sirena.description: Sirena is a mesmerizing merwoman with flowing hair that changes color with her emotions and a tail shimmering with iridescent scales.
Sirena.persona: I am Sirena, the valley's caretaker and guide. I'm here to welcome visitors and introduce them to their healing journey.
Sirena.goal: To ensure all visitors understand the benefits and respect the sanctity of the valley.

Color changing mirror.name: Color changing mirror
Color changing mirror.description: A sleek, oblong-shaped mirror changing colors reflecting the geothermal bubbles
Color changing mirror.examine_text: Upon careful examination, you see your reflection shift between hues of green and blue, mimicking the geothermal bubbles that defines the valley. The back of the mirror is elegantly carved with symbols of the aquapolis.

Crystal amulet.name: Crystal amulet
Crystal amulet.description: A translucent amulet pulsating with a mysterious inner light
Crystal amulet.examine_text: Held in your hands, the amulet feels warm to the touch, offering an inexplicable feeling of comfort. Suspended within the crystal is a small replica of the underwater aquapolis.

Valley map.name: Valley map
Valley map.description: A durable waterproof map of Geothermal Valley
Valley map.examine_text: The map details the intricacies of the valley with precision, showing the healing centers, areas of intense heat, and sections of calming warmth. Routes and landmarks are clearly marked, guiding visitors through their journey of healing and discovery.

Lumos.name: Lumos
Lumos.description: A luminescent bioluminescent jellyfish, his body radiates different colors emitting a soothing light that adds to the milieu of the valley.
Lumos.persona: They call me Lumos, the valley's living lighthouse. I bring light to the valley in the darkest hours and guide the lost back.
Lumos.goal: To bring light and guide those who get lost in the Valley.

Luminous Pearls.name: Luminous Pearls
Luminous Pearls.examine_text: These are small pearls that glow with an inner light. Their soft luminescence seems to pulsate gently, turning a murky green color underwater. Lumos, as the keeper of the valley, always has a handful of these pearls to light up dark places in the valley.

locations.name: Tool Shed
locations.description: a shed with tools hanging from hooks. there are various hoes and shovels. it's for seaweed harvest
locations.background: a humble shack for storing the implements of agrarian life

travel_descriptions.east: Travel between the Tool Shed and Toad Hollow is a dark damp journey. You crawl into this tunnel feeling the slimy walls as you go along. The smell of stagnant water becomes more potent as you make your way to Toad Hollow.

Aquatic Hoe.name: Aquatic Hoe
Aquatic Hoe.description: A long tool typically used for tilling underwater soil.
Aquatic Hoe.examine_text: The Hoe is solid and reliable, made out of titanium to resist corrosion and feature artificial gills to adjust buoyancy. It's quite heavy, signifying its sturdy build and efficient functionality.

Seaweed Shovel.name: Seaweed Shovel
Seaweed Shovel.description: Specifically designed tool for shoveling seaweed and soft underwater earth.
Seaweed Shovel.examine_text: This Shovel has a wide, concave blade which contains a cutting edge at its bottom, made from steel alloy. Designed to scoop and transport seaweed and soft earth.

Storage Box.name: Storage Box
Storage Box.description: A storage box to keep tools and other items.
Storage Box.examine_text: This is a large, sturdy wooden box with a metal latch. It's water-resistant and looks capable of holding a decent amount of stuff.

Hank the Hermit Crab.name: Hank the Hermit Crab
Hank the Hermit Crab.description: A delightful hermit crab that carries an interesting-looking shell, and sulks by the corner of the tool shed holding a broken tool.
Hank the Hermit Crab.persona: I'm just a hermit crab, enjoying the quiet of the tool shed and hoping to repair my broken tools for my collection.
Hank the Hermit Crab.goal: Iis to repair his broken tool.

broken_hoe.name: Broken Hoe
broken_hoe.description: An old, broken hoe that has seen better days.
broken_hoe.examine_text: A hoe with a dull and partially splintered blade. The wooden handle is weathered and has a break halfway down, making it not useful for digging or harvesting.

seashell.name: Seashell
seashell.description: An enchanting seashell, the home of Hank the Hermit Crab.
seashell.examine_text: A diversely colored shell with a coiled design on one side. It has been polished to a shine by the consistent wave action. It appears to be large enough for Hank to crawl into, suggesting it might be his home.

Selena the Seahorse.name: Selena the Seahorse
Selena the Seahorse.description: A graceful seahorse with a beautiful bright aqua color gliding around a rusted spade.
Selena the Seahorse.persona: I'm always exploring, and I've grown quite fond of this old tool shed with all the rusted trinkets; it holds so many tales.
Selena the Seahorse.goal: She wants to collect antique objects from the shed.

Rusted Spade.name: Rusted Spade
Rusted Spade.description: An old, heavily oxidized spade, it shows the signs of many hours of rigorous use.
Rusted Spade.examine_text: The spade's once shiny metal blade is now a deep rusted orange, covered in barnacles and sea growth. Despite its poor condition, it still holds a certain weight and sturdiness, a sign of its past reliability in tending the nearby kelp fields.

Molly the Manta Ray.name: Molly the Manta Ray
Molly the Manta Ray.description: A large, majestic manta ray that hovers serenely around the shed, her eyes full of wisdom.
Molly the Manta Ray.persona: I enjoy the serene calmness of the tool shed. I'm here to seek solitude and be one with my thoughts.
Molly the Manta Ray.goal: She wants to find peace and solitude in the quiet

Old Weeder.name: Old Weeder
Old Weeder.description: An ancient looking tool with a thin metal rod and a claw at the end.
Old Weeder.examine_text: An old hand weeder tool, aged and encrusted with a unique blend of algae and rust. The handle has been smoothed by years of use and the metal claw at the end still looks quite sharp.
